title: Contracts
selectItem: Select item to add to Contract
steps.one: Select the skins that you don`t like, or that you already have in your Steam inventory to make a Contract.
steps.two: Select the skins and check the estimated value of your reward.
steps.three: Create a contract by clicking "CREATE CONTRACT" and get a better skin, just like that.
name: Name
error.maxItemsSelected: You have selected the max number of items
